context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I enjoy thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, exciting and daring adventure movies, and humorous and entertaining flicks. I love it when a movie can combine all of these elements!
context.feelings: I love unexpected movie recommendations that bring excitement to my movie-watching experience. It's always a pleasant surprise to discover new and thrilling movies that I wouldn't have found on my own.
